summary: A command‑line training script that launches a NeMo hybrid RNNT‑CTC speech‑to‑text model (character‑level) using PyTorch Lightning and Hydra. It demonstrates how to specify configuration files, dataset manifests, trainer settings, and optimizer parameters, and also points to fine‑tuning documentation.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to quickly train, experiment with, and fine‑tune state‑of‑the‑art hybrid RNNT‑CTC acoustic models for speech recognition deployments.
